name: Space Surf
description:
Space surf is a casual small game where you have to collect glowing rocks while flying / surfing through space.

Little more info

This game is a beautiful way to relax and enjoy surfing through space, landing from planet to planet and enjoy the beautiful calm music while gathering glowing space rocks! Just go with the flow and try to reach higher and higher scores so you can see your name on the weekly score board!

How to play

I’ve tried to make simple controls: use UP to fly and LEFT/RIGHT to move on planets and to rotate in space. Simple enough right?
